title: PwC
description: Offering a comprehensive software solution that streamlines and automates non-financial reporting for ESG data, this service stands out by aligning with NFRD and CSRD regulations to support diverse industries in sustainability management.

title: Speeki
description: Offering a comprehensive ESG sustainability management system, this platform combines AI-driven insights, integrated whistleblowing solutions, and ISO-certified security to facilitate seamless compliance and proactive ESG management for businesses.
